meta.description: The universal glue of the computing world. Automate, process, and govern the shell.

topics.title: Hello World & Shebang
topics.desc: The first line defines the interpreter. Execution requires chmod +x.

topics.title: Variables
topics.desc: No spaces around `=`. Access with `$`. Quotes matter.
topics.code:
NAME="Shadow"
echo "Hello $NAME"  # Interpolation
echo 'Hello $NAME'  # Literal string

topics.title: Special Variables
topics.desc: Built-in variables for arguments and status.
topics.code:
echo $1  # First argument
echo $#  # Number of arguments
echo $?  # Last exit code (0 = Success)
echo $$  # Process ID

topics.title: Redirection & Pipes
topics.code:
ls > list.txt      # Overwrite stdout to file
echo "Data" >> list.txt # Append
cat file.txt | grep "error" # Pipe output to input

topics.title: Conditionals (If)
topics.desc: Using `[` (test) or `[[` (extended test). Spaces are critical.
topics.code:
if [[ -f "config.json" ]]; then
    echo "File exists"
elif [[ $USER == "root" ]]; then
    echo "Danger"
else
    echo "Safe"
fi

topics.title: Loops
topics.desc: Iterating over lists, files, or ranges.
topics.code:
# C-style
for ((i=0; i<5; i++)); do echo $i; done

# Range
for i in {1..5}; do echo "Num: $i"; done

# While
while [[ $count -gt 0 ]]; do ((count--)); done

topics.title: Functions
topics.desc: Grouping logic. Arguments are handled via $1, $2, etc.

topics.title: Command Substitution
topics.desc: Saving the output of a command into a variable.

topics.title: Case Statement
topics.desc: Cleaner alternative to complex if-else chains.

topics.title: Grep (Search)
topics.code:
grep -r "TODO" src/  # Recursive search
grep -v "node_modules" # Invert match (exclude)
grep -E "^Error|[0-9]" log.txt # Regex

topics.title: Sed (Stream Editor)
topics.desc: Find and replace text in streams.
topics.code:
# Replace 'foo' with 'bar' (first occurrence)
sed 's/foo/bar/' file.txt

# Replace ALL occurrences globally (-i for inplace)
sed -i 's/ERROR/WARNING/g' log.txt

topics.title: Awk (Pattern Scanning)
topics.desc: Powerful text processing language within Bash.
topics.code:
# Print 2nd column of CSV
awk -F',' '{print $2}' data.csv

# Sum numbers in a column
ls -l | awk '{sum += $5} END {print sum}'

topics.title: Strict Mode
topics.desc: The unofficial "Safety Header" for robust scripts.
topics.code:
set -euo pipefail
# -e: Exit on error
# -u: Exit on unset variable
# -o pipefail: Fail if any command in pipe fails
